Turn to Fields Ready to Harvest.--This work is being made the all-absorbing work, but this is not in God's order. It is a never-ending work, and if it is carried on as it has been in the past, all the power of 
                                                                           259
God's people will be required to counterbalance it, and the work of preparing a people to stand amid the perils of the last days will never be done.
